verses.name: 1 Samuel 25:17
verses.text: Now therefore know and consider what thou wilt do; for evil is determined against our master, and against all his household: for he is such a son of Belial, that a man cannot speak to him.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 25:18
verses.text: Then Abigail made haste, and took two hundred loaves, and two bottles of wine, and five sheep ready dressed, and five measures of parched corn, and an hundred clusters of raisins, and two hundred cakes of figs, and laid them on asses.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 25:19
verses.text: And she said unto her servants, Go on before me; behold, I come after you. But she told not her husband Nabal.
